title: Bachelor star Abbie Chatfield unzips her dress while out for brunch
text:
She's the former Bachelor star known for her direct and cheeky personality.

And on Sunday, Abbie Chatfield was up to her old antics as she unzipped her dress while enjoying brunch with fellow reject Jessica Brody.

Taking to Instagram, Jessica shared a video of the Abbie, 24, flaunting her busty assets in the revealing white frock.

Dare to bare! Bachelor star Abbie Chatfield (pictured) could barely contain her busty assets as she unzipped her dress while out for brunch in an Instagram snap shared Sunday

The reality television star left little to the imagination as she pulled down her zipper while seated in a restaurant.

'She got da b**bs,' Jessica captioned the video.

In another post, the Bachelor rejects can be seen smiling for the camera while Abbie holds up a plate of food.

Cheeky: In a video posted to Instagram, Abbie flaunted her assets in the revealing white frock while enjoying brunch with fellow reject Jessica Brody

Abbie's lunch comes one week after she was spotted sharing a steamy kiss with The Bachelorette's Todd King.

The 24-year-old enjoyed a risqué beach romp with Todd in Noosa Queensland.

The reality TV runner-ups first sparked romance rumours last month when they had a flirtatious exchange on Instagram.

Friends: In another post, the Bachelor rejects can be seen smiling for the camera while Abbie holds up a plate of food

When Todd defended the bubbly blonde against sexist trolls, she replied with: 'Send me a date card already, you feminist icon.'

According to New Idea, Abbie has been telling friends about their relationship but right now she wants to keep it low-key.

'I am dating someone, but I can't say who it is,' she told a pal.
description: She's the former Bachelor star known for her direct and cheeky personality.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
